::Zardus::

"Not yet, no," Zardus replies to Chaostaur, nodding in acknowledgement of what Wheeljack said and then setting off for the docking bay, "The meeting's been posponed. Report to my position, though."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Alright.  I am back.  And i only have two large holes in my arm...  But 
> anyway...  On with the post.
> 
> ::Chaostaur::
>        He opened another com to Zardus since his first had been ignored.  
> "Helllllllooooo?  Zardus?  Did you want me to kill something or what?"
